- DEN beats MIN
- POR wins out
- OKC beats MIL
- LAC beats UTA
- SA beats DAL

DEN vs UTA and HOU vs OKC are the swing games.

DEN + HOU win: Face LAC as 6
DEN win, HOU loses; Face UTA as 4
DEN lose + HOU win: Face SA as 2
DEN + HOU lose: Face UTA as 4.
